term.name: hedonism
term.def: The principle that the fundamental standard of ethical judgment is or should be pleasure. Although the term has connotations of &sensualism; and &emotionalism;, philosophical hedonists (such as those in the tradition of &epicureanism;) advocate an enlightened hedonism that is often a kind of &naturalism;. Hedonism is usually a kind of &egoism; or &individualism;.
